game_description: Join the best virtual music party ever. Sing like a star in the most interactive online karaoke. PartyOn is a virtual music event app. In PartyOn, users from all over the world can hold various music events, from sing-along parties to concerts with thousands of people. Unique Features: Awesome Lively Avatars Customize your own full-body 3D avatar like a true rock star! Comes with a range of facial expressions and gestures. Immersive and Gorgeous Virtual Rooms Sing your heart out from nightclubs to outer space. Ignite that party mood in places unimaginable. Selection of Music and MV Content Top popular karaoke songs by the hundreds, infused with virtual super-effects and avatar animations to blast your senses to the stars. Real-Time Social Interactions Sophisticated audio systems for truly one-of-a-kind party spaces, chat and interact with fun and wonky objects/emojis as you enjoy live singing from around the globe. More awesomeness coming up!
review_1: Itâ€™s so laggy and you keep on getting logged out
review_2: We experienced periodic microphone issue. Sometimes, I would not hear my friends even I stood right next to them. I needed to close the app, and restart. Sometimes, I even needed to reboot the headset if we initially joined from party, and switched from party voice to app voice. One occasion, I couldn't watch or hear the music from the screen but my friend was able to. Updated: I am suspecting may be I recently switched Air Link on. I turned it off completely and will see if my issue resolve, and will update again.
review_3: Videos with the lyrics don't work in studio or party mode. This app has the potential to be amazing and there's no other kareoke apps I've seen on vr. Please get the android app going and make it so the player can import YouTube tracks.
review_4: it freezes after choosing an avatar
review_5: Very fun but strange that the singer cannot hear his/her own voice
